name: Mercy
description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff
abilities.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally's health or increase the amount of damage they deal.

abilities.name: Caduceus Blaster
abilities.description: Mercy shoots a round from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.

abilities.name: Angelic Descent
abilities.description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health.
